entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: By activating all the control terminals you have given Druno Kener a chance to create a security breach in the factory's control system.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find and activate four control terminals throughout the droid factory. Activating the terminals will allow Druno Kener to create a security breach in the factory's control system.
entries.journal_entry_title: Find and Activate the Four Control Terminals
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Activate the fourth of the four terminals
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Activate the third of four terminals
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Activate the second of four terminals
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Activate the first of four terminals
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Find and activate the four control terminals.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You have activated all four terminals. Return to Druno Kener.
